products.name: Tickle Me Socks
products.description: These socks are so soft, they'll make your feet giggle with joy. Warning: Excessive wiggling may occur.

products.name: Infinite Coffee Mug
products.description: Introducing the mug that never runs out of coffee! Just kidding, it's a regular mug, but it does hold your dreams and aspirations.

products.name: Unicorn Duct Tape
products.description: Fixing things has never been this magical. Our duct tape is approved by mythical creatures everywhere.

products.name: Marshmallow Shooter
products.description: Turn marshmallow warfare into a fluffy and sugary adventure. Bonus points if you catch them in your mouth!

products.name: Gravity-Defying Hat
products.description: This hat has mastered the art of levitation. Now you can truly stand out in a crowd (or float above it).

products.name: Squeaky Clean Soap
products.description: Get ready to scrub-a-dub-dub with our soap that makes bath time sound like a rubber ducky orchestra.

products.name: Plant Whisperer Megaphone
products.description: Finally, a megaphone that communicates with plants. Give your foliage friends the motivational speeches they deserve.

products.name: Fuzzy Logic Pillow
products.description: This pillow has a degree in fuzzy logic. It's always there to provide a soft landing for your most perplexing thoughts.

products.name: Jet-Propelled Sneakers
products.description: Run faster than your imagination with these sneakers. Warning: May accidentally launch you into the future.

products.name: Disco Ball Waffle Maker
products.description: Breakfast just got groovy. Make waffles that spin and shine, bringing the dance floor to your dining table.

products.name: Zombie Repellent Spray
products.description: Keep zombies at bay with our scientifically unproven spray. Works on humans too, just in case.

products.name: Rainbow Pencil Set
products.description: Write in every color of the rainbow with our enchanted pencil set. Warning: May cause sudden bursts of creativity.

specifications.colors_included: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple

products.name: Chocolate-Coated Broccoli
products.description: Healthy meets indulgent in this bizarre fusion. It's like a carnival for your taste buds... with nutrients.

products.name: Silent Alarm Clock
products.description: Wake up without waking up everyone else. Our alarm clock uses silent disco technology to get you moving.

products.name: Sunglasses for Pets
products.description: Because even your pet deserves to be the coolest one on the block. Watch them strut their stuff in style.

products.name: Remote-Controlled Snack Tray
products.description: Too comfy to get up for snacks? No problem! Navigate your snacks to you with this remote-controlled tray.

products.name: Fluffy Unicorn Slippers
products.description: Step into a world of pure imagination with these slippers. Warning: May induce spontaneous unicorn sightings.

products.name: Electric S'mores Maker
products.description: Who needs a campfire when you have an electric s'mores maker? It's like a mini bonfire on your countertop.

products.name: Hovering Pet Rock
products.description: The classic pet rock just got an upgrade. It hovers, it rocks, and it might just become your new best friend.

products.name: Dinosaur-Shaped Pasta
products.description: Make your meals prehistoric with our dino-shaped pasta. Warning: May cause sudden cravings for Jurassic Park marathons.

products.name: iPhone
products.description: Apple's latest iPhone 69, it has a nice screen, nice camera, nice design, and a nice charging hole Mmmmm
